1.content:
Deep underground, in the vast rivers of lifestream that traversed the planet of Gaia, a weak eddy in the flow initiated the crystallation of a portion of energy into a small crystal. Over the course of many years, this crystal grew to become a chunk of materia that travelled on the rivers of life energy, until eventually bursting to the surface on a fountain of mako energy high on a mountain top.

It lay on the edge of the fountain for a while, until by chance a curious bird picked it up in it's talons and took to the air. The bird flew over the countryside, carrying the materia with it, until eventually the creature's thoughts turned to food. The image of a fat, juicy worm formed in it's bird brain.

The bird transformed suddenly, sending the materia and a very confused worm plummeting to the ground. The materia landed with a thud, rolled a little through the grass, and came to a safe stop. A hand reached down and picked it up.

A hand that belonged to...
1.title: What goes up...

11.content: The hand belonged to Cloud Strife, spiky-haired protagonist extraordinaire. But from which point in the series?
11.title: Cloud

1121.content:
It had been only minutes since they'd seen Tifa being taken by Chocobo Cart to the home of the lecherous Don Cornea and Cloud was anxious to rescue her. His bright blue eyes passed briefly over the ever-changing hues of the materia that had almost fallen on his head before he handed it to Aeris.

"These are really rare, if it's what I think it is," she said.

"Unless it can help us rescue, Tifa, I don't care," he dismissed.

"Maybe it can," she replied. The materia glowed in her hand, there was a flash of light, and the long metal staff in her other hand suddenly became a bunch of flowers. She smelled them and smiled. "It is{/} what I thought it was; morph materia." His amazement amused her. Turning the flowers back into her staff with another mental command, she raised her right hand for him to see. "That's nothing. Watch this." There was another flash of light from the materia, and her arm, from her fingertips to her elbow, became another perfectly-real, perfectly-scented bouquet of flowers.

"Perhaps we can use this to sneak you into Don Corneo's mansion," she explained as she turned her arm back into an arm. "He doesn't allow men to enter, so we can disguise you as..."
1121.title: Sneaking in to Don Corneo's

11211.content:
Hmmmm, that might work, cloud thought, it would also give him the chance to get a new body for a while.
"You know, that might just work!" cloud said
"ok, so lets see... I suppose you could go as me! it might be a bit odd for me," Aeiris said.
Hmm, ok, ill go as....
11211.title: Desicions

112112.content: "But maybe you could go a tifa!" Aeris added. "We would have twice as much of a chace to get in!"
112112.title: Other

choices: A Guard stopped them from entering
1121121.content:
Clou thought about it, hed always wanted to be closer to Tifa, but This wasn't quite th way he'd imagined. Plus, what if tTifa was already in there? That could make the situation VERY messy, But Regardless, he had to soilder on, too save Tifa!

" Alright, i'll do it, but I'll need some bettr fitting clothes" Cloud said, But aeris cleary had that sorted, as she threw him a blue dress.

Cloud Held the materia, And Saw it shine extremely bright. Within seconds, Cloud felt Heavier, Much heavier. He looked down to see a mass of cleavage, resting on his chest.
He looked much more forward this than he first thought.

"Are you Ready?" Aeris said as he turned to cloud.
"Yup, lets go!" He said

They approached the towering mansion of corneo
1121121.title: Getting to buisness

choices: Cloud takes some time to admire his body
11211211.content:
" Sorry, The dons not seeing anymore Girls tonight, you'll just hve to come back another day" Said A Burly guard standing by the door
"Oh No! We need to get in badly though!" Aeris said
"Listen, your not the only ladies desperate for the The Don, But, Unless you plan On breaking the door down, come back tommorow!"
That was when cloud got an idea, He was in tifa's body, so he must have her strength.
With one Powerful kick, cloud kicked the door down, Leaving the guard stunned
"Well, Go right in.... i guess...."

" Wow cloud! That was impressive!" Aeris said
" Pfft, it was nothing for this body" cloud said gloatingly

They headed upstair, and down into the torture room, which was also called the waiting room. Tifa was sleeping on a table.
" We can' just wake her up, can we?" Aeris said
"No, But we can't just leave her here either, so ive go an idea" Cloud said.

Cloud swapped Back, But then touched the materia to tifa, There was another flash of light, and cloud dissapeared, leaving only Tifa standing up.
"Wheres cloud went!?" Aeris asked in a panick.

"Its alright, im cloud, I just merged with tifa so i could bring her with us"
11211211.title: An Unexpected Problem

1121122.content: "well cloud i could just imagin what you'd look like as a girl and chage you into that." aris said
1121122.title: cloud > girl form

11212.content:
Cloud didn't like the idea of becoming one of her things, but if it was the only way to gain access to Don Corneo's mansion and save Tifa, he'd willingly do it. Besides, there was something very trustworthy about this girl from the slums, even though he'd only met her a few hours ago.

He nodded. "Okay, I'll do it."

"Great! You can be my staff!"
11212.title: Cloud > "...one of my possessions."

112122.content:
Cloud shook his head. "Too risky. They'll confiscate any weapons as soon as you enter."

"Oh, that's right," Aeris admitted. "You could be my ribbon?" she offered, indicating the red ribbon that tied her hair in a ponytail.
112122.title: No go on the staff plan

1121222.content:
Her brow furrowed in thought. "But you'd be so small that I could lose you. And then I'd never be able to turn you back." She took a deep breath and looked resolved. "Okay, you're going to have to be my dress."

The dress in question was long and figure-hugging, and more than a little pink. It would certainly be hard to misplace him. But there was also the question of the figure hugging. The idea of being spread tight across her moderate chest and admittedly boyish frame filled with a mixture of dread and interest.
1121222.title: Cloud > Dress?

11212222.content:
"Pink isn't really my colour," Cloud said.

Aerith smiled and nodded. "And you could get ripped." She held out her wrists, revealing the two thick metal bracelets she wore. "How about one of these?"
11212222.title: Cloud > Bracelets?

112122222.content:
those could be wepons too they might take them.

"okay how bout one of my shoes"
112122222.title: "Nah."

choices: as above but the materia is taken
1121222221.content: "okay that sounds good." cloud said and without another word he was transformed into her shoe he could see half darkness and half of her and then he saw her foot being put in him and then he felt her weight it was emense compared to him and when she started walking he felt it grinding agenst him
1121222221.title: yes

11212222212.content:
He could taste every thread of her cotton socks, every curve of her foot, as she walked the path to the Don's mansion; to him a repetition of painful compression and release as her foto smacked him against the dirt path. His vision obscured and his hearing muffled by the invasive foot, he nethertheless heard the Don's guards confronting Aeris.

"Arms out," the guard ordered. Cloud could hear a series of pats and rustle of clothing. She was being searched. And then... "What's this?"

"Oh! That thing? That's just a cure materia," Aeris lied. "It's for my grandmother. She's very sick."

"Whatever. No materia inside, lady. You can pick it up after the Don is finished with you. He's waiting. Inside."

"But-"

There was movement again - Cloud could feel Aeris digging him into the ground as though she was being forced forward. Then the slamming of heavy doors behind them.

There was silence. Her body weight shifted inside him as she crouched down to whisper to her shoe, "I'm sorry, Cloud! They got the materia. I can't change you back!"

Just then...
11212222212.title: as above but the materia is taken

11213.content:
It was as they stood watching the sofar-impenetrable front gates to Don Corneo's Mansion, that a chocobo-pulled carriage pulled up outside. It was filled with Wall Market goods; lavish clothes and expensive food for the Don, and a selection of weapons and equipment for his henchmen.

"We can disguise you as something that gets delivered inside," Aerith said. "Then you can change back and save Tifa."

The gates to the mansion began to open for the carriage. If they were going to do this, they couldn't afford to wait around.
11213.title: Cloud Delivery Service

choices: Disguise Cloud as a raw chicken
112131.content: They ran closer until they were crouching behind the open back of the cart. Aerith peered over the top. A row of raw, plucked chickens were hung from the roof.
112131.title: Delivering Cloud

1121311.content:
"I'll disguise you as a chicken," Aerith suggested. The cart began to rumble forwards; clearly they didn't have a lot of time to debate this. Cloud nodded quickly and Aerith grabbed him by the arm, willing the morph materia into life.

The changes were quick and unpleasant. His hands and feet shrivelled immediately into fleshy and bony stumps respectively, causing him to fall forwards into her arms. She could feel his skin become cold, clammy, and goosepimpley as his body warped under her hands; his skeletal structure stretching and fusing to match that of a bird, and his insides hollowing out into a large cavity that obliterating his heart, lungs, and other things that would technically now be classed as gizzards. The expression on his face was pained, and she couldn't help but feel relieved as his head shrank and vanished into his swelling torso, leaving an open neck-hole.

He was shrinking, and was already light enough for her to hold him up from the dirty cobblestones of Wall Market. His clothes, fortunately, were the last to change. They unravelled and shrank, becoming lengths of string that trussed his body tightly.

The transformation completed, leaving him as a sizeable bird; she estimated him at around 10 pounds. Quickly, she took the morph materia and pushed it inside Cloud's chest cavity, before placing him onto the cart as it passed through the gates.
1121311.title: Disguise Cloud as a raw chicken

choices: Cloud-chicken bides his time some more
11213112.content:
The chocobo-pulled cart came to a stop within the courtyard of the Don's mansion. A group of henchmen bustled about it, taking deliveries inside. The raw Cloud-chicken lay on the wooden slats at the bottom of the cart, considering his next move.

There weren't many options. He could transform back and attempt to fight his way through the crowds of henchmen taking care of the delivery, endangering himself and potentially Tifa. Or he could wait, maintain the pretense of being poultry until he was in an area free of guards, then morph back, and save her with minimal effort and danger.

It turned out that maintaining the pretense of being a chicken was really quite easy; and consisted of allowing himself to be manhandled by one of the henchmen and carried through a side-entrance, down a passageway, and into a kitchen, where he was placed down on one of the worktops and left alone. The Morph Materia, which had tumbled about precariously during transit, came to a rest inside.

The last vestiges of his human heat leeched out into the cold marble of the worktop.
11213112.title: Cloud-chicken bides his time

112131121.content:
Without a neck, or indeed a head, Cloud was able only to stare forwards at a rack of large kitchen knives placed on the worktop beside him; all the more terrifying now that they were twice his size and he was currently a slab of unprocessed meat. His skin smarted like crazy, as though it really had been plucked red raw.

There seemed to be nobody around. Perhaps it was safe to-

The sound of the kitchen door delayed his de-transformation plans. He waited as the unseen person moved around the kitchen, eventually passing in front of him. It was...
112131121.title: Cloud-chicken bides his time some more

1121311212.content: The figure stopped beside the part of the worktop on which Cloud had been laid. He tried his best to look chicken-like, as they bent down to examine him.
1121311212.title: Somebody stops to examine Cloud-chicken

11213112121.content:
Cloud had never been so terrified of a grossly overweight man in his life. The blonde, balding, mafioso stared down at him as though he knew he was there, and licked his lips.

Don't panic. He doesn't even know you're - WHOAH!

Don Corneo suddenly grabbed Cloud by his front drumsticks and shook him violent, jostling the morph materia from his rear end, which rolled across the counter out of sight. Don Corneo held him up in triumph.

"I knew it!" he cried. "My, my, my, look at you. This was quite a disguise, I must say. Unfortunately for you, I saw youu sneaking in. Your lady friend was quite the artist with that morph materia. Really, you look just like chicken." He tossed Cloud back down on the counter surface and ran a hand over his cold, plucked, puckered flesh. "I expect she got the taste just right too."

Cloud began to struggle. Aerith was indeed skilled with the morph materia, and had been smart enough to give his new body a certain degree of mobility. But she had also trussed his body from gullet-to-drumstick with string so tight that all he was able to manage was a desperate wiggle. The Don laughed as the raw chicken writhed helplessly on the counter before him. With deliberate slowness, he drew the largest kitchen knife and pressed it's flat edge against the chicken's bare back.

"You must be the SOLDIER I've heard so much about," he said, as the chicken shuddered at the sudden coldness of the knife. "The one that ShinRa have tried so hard to stop. And now look at you."
11213112121.title: Don Corneo vs Cloud-Chicken

112131121211.content:
"This was hardly a plan befitting a SOLDIER now, was it?" the Don mocked. "You should have gone all the way and used an actual silver platter."

He slid the knife between Cloud's two rear drumsticks and slit the string binding them together. The chicken, sensing this taste of freedom, began to wriggle anew. The Don allowed it's struggles to continue for a while, noting how it's movements took it ever so slowly, ever so desperately in the direction that the morph materia had fallen, before taking a drumstick in each hand and spreading them wide until the thigh bones and cartilage creaked and cracked, exposing the entrance to Cloud's body cavity.

"I suppose you're here to rescue that Tifa girl," the Don asked, as he bustled about the kitchen behind Cloud. "What a shame that no-one is here to rescue you."

His pelvis was broken, his legs immovable from their spread, vulnerable position, but his plucked winged still scraped weakly against the tabletop, pulling his body, millimetre by millimetre, towards the distant morph materia. He knew he didn't have a chance of reaching it, but he had to try; he had to do something. Otherwise Tifa would be at the whims of this horrible man. And he would be...

A heavy hand larger than himself held him firmly to the counter and another, balled into a fist, forced it's way between his drumsticks.

"This may leave you a little tender," Don Corneo warned, as he pushed a handful of stuffing deep inside Cloud's chest cavity. The chicken contorted in agony around his fist. "And sweet. And succulent."
112131121211.title: The Don stuffs Cloud

1121311212111.content:
"Do you know why little chickens like you get filled with stuffing?" Don Corneo asked as pushed another huge clod of stuffing inside his trapped trespasser. "To make the meat go further." He laughed cruelly. "But you don't seem to be going anywhere at all!"

A few handfuls more and Cloud was packed so tightly that he could barely move. His torso was swollen, lifting his broken drumsticks and naked wings off the tabletop, which waggled helplessly in the air. He tried to calm his terrified, eratic thoughts; to formulate a plan; but the growing realization that he was truly trapped in this form and the terrible sensation of being filled to bursting were almost too much to bear.

"It's quite pathetic really. I'm sure in life you were a great man: handsome, brave, strong... And now you don't even have the strength to crawl away."
1121311212111.title: The Don keeps stuffing Cloud

11213112121112.content:
"It's a little late to play dead now," Don Corneo said, as the chicken's movements became weaker and weaker with despair.

Prodding and poking it failed to elicit a response. "Well this is no fun. How am I supposed to play with my food if it doesn't play with me?"
11213112121112.title: The chicken despairs

112131121211121.content:
Corneo took the morph materia and prodded the chicken with a finger.

"Speak!" he commanded.
112131121211121.title: Gives Cloud his voice back

1121311212111212.content:
As the Don removed his finger, Cloud knew that he had the power to speak. he also knew there was nothing he could say that would persuade the Don to change him back.

The Don sighed at his silence.
1121311212111212.title: Cloud refuses to play along

11213112121112122.content:
The Don sighed at the uncooperative Cloud splayed out on the chicken counter below him. If he wasn't going to play with him, then he had served his purpose, and would now serve another - the one his body was now designed for. He would be cooked.

"If you want to act like a chicken then I'm afraid I'm just going to have to treat you like one," the Don said. He began to drape Cloud in layers of cold bacon. Cloud squirmed beneath their coldness, but otherwise didn't provde enough sport for the Don to reconsider eating him. Hands grabbed him, squashed him onto a metal basin lines with tin foil. The walls of the basin, though shallow, seemed to rise up around him, and the belly and face of the Don filled the sky.

Then he was placed in the over. The door slammed shut, trapping him, seperating from the world, seperating him from Tifa, forever.
11213112121112122.title: A boring game

112131121212.content: The Don lay the knife down on the counter and retrieved the morph materia from where it had rolled. The wicked glint in his eyes mirrored its swirling energies as he held it tantalizingly close to Cloud's body.
112131121212.title: Something else

choices: The Don keeps him as he is
1121311212121.content:
The Don pressed the materia against Cloud's cold chicken skin, and the ex-SOLDIER tried with all his might to will the thing into action, to transform himself back into a human form so that he could beat the crap out of this fat Don. The materia sparked into life, but no transformation occured.

"I think you'll find that the materia only responds to the most powerful mind touching it," the Don informed him. "Even as a human, I'm sure your intellect would be far, far below that of mine. But as a chicken, and a dead one at that, it barely even registers." The Don pressed the materia harder into his flesh, indenting him. "The amusing thing is that the longer you remain in a form, the more your mind ajusts to fit it. In a few days you won't even remember being human. And whatever I make you, that's what you will become. Then again, I like you as you are."
1121311212121.title: The Don transforms Cloud

choices: Something less meaty, but inanimate all the same!
11213112121211.content:
"But not as much as I'd like another sweet little plaything, and you'll look pretty good with your friends!"

The tingling of magic lit up every nerve in what passed for Cloud's body, and the sensation only became greater as he felt himself becoming
11213112121211.title: The Don transforms him

choices: The hair is Blonde. We all knew Cloud would make a pretty girl.
The hair is Brown, blocking heaving giants... Tifa?
112131121212111.content:
Nerves aflame and with the Don's haughty laughter ringing throughout the room, Cloud's mind reeled with the wave of raw sensations washing over him as his form became something entirely greater than mere chicken. The stubby legs which had been astride his bloated torso were growing longer even as his stomach and chest grew, but far less proportionately. Stubby, awkwardly bent wings straightened, fingers blossoming forth.

But as soon as he saw those fingers he knew something was amiss. They were thin, slender, and capped with nails entirely too long to be his own. Even as Cloud's head and face regrew into something human nothing quite sat correctly, from the shape of his mouth to the unexpected weight on his chest.

By the time the magic faded, mere seconds from when he had been a step short of someone's meal, Cloud knew the Don had far worse in mind than simply eating him. Don Corneo, for his part, emitted only a low growl, sounding equally hungry and satisfied.

"You turned out quite lovely, my newest little chicky."

As soon as he'd turned his head down to look himself over Cloud knew what had happened, even as hair fell over his eyes - blocking his vision, Cloud gazed upon a pair of breasts. He was a woman!
112131121212111.title: Human! Arms, legs, breasts, w-huh?

choices: "Boys, get this one something to wear and deliver her to my room."
"And I'm gonna show you right here on this table, Toots"
1121311212121112.content:
The weight of them was stunning, but looking down on them for that first moment or two Cloud was utterly mesmerized. He knew them, of course, despite his best efforts not to stare when she wasn't paying attention. The deep brown locks falling across his vision only confirmed his worst suspicions.

"I always wanted to play with Twins, little Chicky."

The Don's haughty laughter rang in Cloud's ears and instinct took over. A fist was thrown somewhere in the neighborhood of the fat man's face even as Cloud sprang to her feet and started running. And entirely new center of gravity made both actions futile, her fist missing the Don by inches even as the mass in her chest and hips, unplanned for by the brain of an Ex-SOLDIER, nearly sent her toppling over.

What stopped Midgar's newest brunette beauty from hitting the floor was a calloused hand around her wrist, pulling her close even as she began to squirm and struggle. Another arm wrapped around her waist holding her in place from behind even as her wrist was released, the Don's free hand running from her waist, up her flat stomach to her chest, where he gleefully took one of Cloud's new "additions" in hand and squeezed.

Alien sensations ran through Cloud's body, unprepared for the feeling of a rough hand on Tifa's soft skin, never mind being groped.

"S-stop!"

She knew she'd made a mistake as soon as she spoke, the desperate mewl sounding entirely too vulnerable, too sultry. The Don's grip only tightened, and she could feel his excitement.

"Get used to it, Hot Stuff, because there's plenty more where that came from."
1121311212121112.title: The hair is Brown, blocking heaving giants... T...

1121311212122.content:
"And now look at me..." Cloud watched in horror as the rolls of fifty-year-old fat shrank and vanished from the Don's body, revealing a well-honed, muscular physique beneath. The small tuft of off-yellow hair on his head became a full, proud head of spikiness, and the stained, moth eaten dinner jacket morphed into the close-fitting, dark-coloured clothing Cloud knew so well.

Don Corneo examined his, or rather Cloud's, body with admiration. "Yeowza! The chickies must be all over you." He flexed a bicep and cackled. "That flower girl who transformed you," he mused. "She looked just naive enough to be fooled by this."
1121311212122.title: The Don transforms himself

11213112121221.content:
He picked up the still struggling Cloud and threw him in the freezer, dropping a bucket of ice over him before closing the door. As a frozen chicken, Cloud would keep for the Don to play with him some other time. But right now there was a naive young flower girl waiting outside for him and his amazing new body. Dabbing olive oil on his hands and slicking back his proud, blonde spikes, the Don hopped and skipped with excitement to the door.

He slipped out the back entrance and skirted his compound. There was the flower girl, hiding behind a mound of rubble, watching and waiting for her friend to return. The Don smirked to himself as she excitedly waved him over.

"I'm so glad you're safe, Cloud, but where's Tifa?"
11213112121221.title: He leaves

choices: Turn Cloud into an item of food
1121312.content: There were other items of food besides chickens.
1121312.title: Look around for something else

choices: She is interrupted before she has a chance
13.content:
The shining piece of materia didn't sit long among the grass before it was caught by the eagle eye and quick hand of the young ninja, Yuffie Kisaragi, who had strayed from the group during their travels. She loved materia: she loved its color, its brilliance, its divine expensiveness. Her eyes lit up with glee at the sight of it.

But if the others found her with it, they'd take it away, add it to the communal pool of materia. She decided to quickly-
13.title: Yuffie

135.content:
"Yuffie, try not to wander so far from the group."

Yuffie jumped at the sudden interruption and attempted frantically to hide the materia in her shorts, but to no avail. Cloud sighed in dissapointment as he caught sight of her.

"The materia is shared equally between everyone, Yuffie," he reminded her. He held out his hand for it.

But it was hers. She found it.
135.title: Yuffie is interrupted before she has a chance

choices: One of them morphs the other
1351.content:
Yuffie pouted but she'd known the rules when she'd agreed to join the group. With utmost sadness and unnecessary slowness, she placed the morph materia into Cloud's outstretched hand.

The materia was in contact with them both, tapping in to their thoughts and feelings. For a brief moment, they were both capable of morphing the other.
1351.title: She hands it over

13513.content:
Cloud took the materia and placed it within a pouch without a word, before turning and heading off in the direction he had come.

"Cosmo Canyon isn't far ahead but it'll be dark soon. Don't wander off again."

Sulking and moping, Yuffie followed after him. Perhaps it wasn't too late to leave these guys.
13513.title: Nothing happens

135131.content:
It was dark by the time they reached Cosmo Canyon. Red XIII bounded away immediately to greet old friends, the others, exhausted from a day of hard travel, found the nearest inn and headed for it with a cacophony of yawns and grumbles about aching feet. The inn was a simple one-room afair, but it was warm and comfortable, and in no time the weary eyes of the travellers closed.

Except Yuffie's. She remained wide-away; her eyes glued to the materia pouch at Cloud's waist. When she was sure everyone was asleep, she rose and crossed carefully to where Cloud lay. He stirred briefly as she crouched over him, nimble fingers teasing open the straps securing the pouch and slipping inside. One finger made contact with the cold, hard surface of the morph materia. Cloud's eyelids fluttered open.
135131.title: Yuffie steals it back later

1351311.content: Yuffie's heart hammered as Cloud opened his eyes, her mind raced. The morph materia flickered into life.
1351311.title: Yuffie transforms into somebody else

13513111.content:
Cloud blearily opened his eyes to see a female face above him, framed by dark hair. He wiped the sleep from his eyes and asked groggilly, "T-tifa?"

Finally detecting a coherent mental image in its wielder's mind, the morph materia did it's work. Yuffie's body grew in a second from lithe ninja to buxum, brawling barmaid. The shock of realizing she had become Tifa and the weight of her new breasts put her off balance.

She fell bodily onto him, her hand still investigating the pouch at his waist. "H-hi, Cloud," she whispered in the darkness. "I... I know what this looks like..."
13513111.title: Yuffie > Tifa

13513112.content: What about a half moogle version of herself?
13513112.title: What about Yuffie> Moogle

135131121.content:
Yuffie brainstormed quickly, thinking of ways to make herself less suspicious. As she thought she randomly came across an odd idea, people didn't suspect moogles, so if she could disguise herself as one...

before she could complete her thought she felt various changes take place. First white fur had grown over her body, making her feel warm and soft, then her nails had turned black and a little sharp. Next her mouth became slightly muzzle like, and her nose turned black. A moogle's pom-pom grew from the top of her head, it was red and fuzzy. Finally a pair of small black wings grew from her back.

Yuffie then looked at her body in shock.

"Wh-what happened, kupo?" she said aloud, "And why'd I say 'kupo', kupo? Aagh!" Yuffie exclaimed when Cloud woke up.

"Yuffie is that you?" Cloud asked.

Yuffie then...
135131121.title: Yuffie> Moogle, Kupo!

choices: "But you probably deserve it," he finished, going back to sleep.
1351311211.content:
"Y-yes, kupo" Yuffie nodded, her pom-pom bopping him on the head with each nod. Cloud swatted it away irritably and sat up.

"I don't know how this happened," Cloud began.
1351311211.title: Told the truth

choices: She tries to stalk Cloud so she can steal it, but she fails
13513112112.content:
"But you deserve it!" Cloud said, turning to go back to sleep, but snatching away the morph materia first.

"What! your not going to let me undo this, kupo?" Yuffie whined. Cloud just shook his head.

"Nope, maybe when you decide not to steal from your friends I'll give it back."

"C'mon, kupo, I'll go insane if I keep saying that, kupo. Besides i never ste-" Cloud then gave her a this converation is over look and went to sleep.

Yuffie sighed and shook her head, making her pom-pom shake even more before she went to bed.

The next day....
13513112112.title: "But you probably deserve it,"

choices: He leaves her as she is
135131121121.content:
"Please change me back, kupo!" Yuffie begged as she struggled to keep pace with the group. Her tiny moogle legs, even running full out, could only just compete with their human strides. She was exhausted.

"You know I &%$# hate those things!" Barrett declared, gesturing at the tiny animal thief with his gun arm. "But I still prefer her like this!"

"I hate you, kupo! As soon as you turn me back I'm leaving!"

"Is that a promise?" Barrett laughed.

Laughing sympathetically, Aeris reached down and patted the moogle on the top of its head. "They're only teasing you. They'll turn you back soon. Won't you Cloud." The last part was directly with more severity at Cloud, who was tossing the Morph Materia from one hand to the other, and merely shrughed.
135131121121.title: Half the group teases her

The stench in the small room became unbearable, even for the three girls from whom it was originating.

Cloud began to feel himself be pulled out of Tifa's boot. He emerged as a small ball of light that darted round the room, similar to Yuffie. But he would not be returning to human form . 1352121221222211.content:
....1 Week Later
Cloud wasn't sure if he could hold onto his sanity. Being on an adventure and everything, Tifa, Yuffie, and Aerith never took off their boots. They never washed their feet either. The sweat built up profusely and the smell never seemed to have a limit with how disgusting it could get. Cloud was forced to do NOTHING but SMELL their FEET and DRINK their FOOT SWEAT. He couldn't see anything except the sweaty insides of their boots, and he couldn't hear much from inside the boots...he wasn't sure how much longer he could hold on.
...1 Month later
Unfortunately for Cloud, it seemed he couldn't even lose his sanity. Something about the materia forced him to stay sane, it forced him to be practically invincible, like the Hero Materia. But suffering was something that the materia did not protect from. Everyday Cloud wished for this to end, somehow, someway. He did not want to spend an unforseen amount of time, day after day, smelling feet, eating toe jam, drinking foot sweat, trapped under ever encompassing foot flesh. Tifa and Yuffie were trying to think up ways to return Cloud to normal. Meanwhile Aerith was searching for Cloud ever since, trying so hard to find him, not knowing he was right beneath her, just like she wished. Tifa and Yuffie figured that the materia works by wishes, so they should be able to wish Cloud out of there. They also remembered that big crack down the middle of the materia. Tifa explained, "Look Yuffie, I think we only have one shot at this, the materia looked like it was about to break the last time we used it. We have to make sure we make the right wish, or else Cloud could be trapped under our feet forever." After a whole month since the incident, Yuffie kind of got used to having Cloud under her feet. She replied, "Oooorr...we could use the last wish on something like infinite treasure you know? I'm kinda likin' the idea of Cloud under my feet." Tifa almost slapped her, "Are you crazy!?..that's disgusting!" Yuffie laughed back, "C'mon Tifa, where's your sense of humor? He HAS to smell our feet...your right, it is disgusting, and he has to do it forever, thats what makes it so funny!" Tifa actually giggled, but then returned to a stern face, "No! We have to change him back, let's go talk to Aerith, she has the materia. We have to do this somehow with all three of us present, our boots off, and without Aerith knowing." *Sigh*, "Fine..." Yuffie replied.
They met up with Aerith, in the same room where the incident originally happened. They convinced Aerith into a pedicure for all of them, and proceeded to take of their boots. An ungodly smell filled the room once again. Cloud could finally see and hear what was going on. Aerith seemed depressed. "What wrong Aerith?" Tifa inquired, already knowing the answer. "It's Cloud, I wonder where he could be...It's as if he just...disappeared." Yuffie cut in, "Oh, I bet he's somewhere nice and comfy. He's probably nice and hydrated too. He's even getting some sweet aroma therapy! He's having the time of his life right now! Bet you he never wants to leave. Not ever." Cloud overheard this and couldn't help but curse Yuffie. Tifa actually couldn't help but laugh at Cloud's predicament at this point, but not without telling Yuffie to cut it out. Aerith then replied, while caressing the materia, "Well, if he's in a place like that, its got to be a much better place than this world. If he really is having the time of his life, than I wish he stays there forever." Yuffie and Tifa immediately gave each other wide-eyed looks. Tifa yelled, "OH NO!". But it was too late.
The materia only understands what it is told. Because of Yuffie's first misunderstanding that Cloud actually LIKED her feet, the materia could only surmise that Cloud really was having the time of his life. Their feet all began glowing like the incident one month ago. Unknown to them, something sinister was happening to Cloud. Believing that Cloud was enjoying himself, the materia granted Aeriths wish, to keep Cloud there forever. Cloud suddenly felt funny, he felt as if he was now grounded where he was. He was overcome by somekind of anxiety that he would never escape his current predicament. The materia then shattered into pieces, effectively sealing Cloud in for life.
Actually, very unfortunately for Cloud, Aerith actually said, "forever", so he began to feel something more. He felt like he was pulled deeper into the feet. He was drawn in until he found himself standing in a moderately lit room. He fell flat on his face into the apparently soggy floor. Some of the drenched floor got in his mouth and he immediately recognized he taste and scent. It was the combination of Aerith, Tifa, and Yuffie's feet. There were piles of Toe Jam 10-20 feet high in any given direction. The space seemed infinitely large. The smell felt like it was suffocating him, but there was nothing he could to do to offset it. His own body was saturated in the scent. Cloud cursed his fate, he tried to strangle himself, only to find he was unable. Suddenly, from all directions, he saw infinitely increasing pairs of feet that he clearly recognized as the feet of his previous captors. The feet came and rubbed him all over his body, forcing themselves into his mouth, all over his face, gripping his nose in between their stinky sweaty toes. The feet were so strong Cloud could do nothing to resist. He began to cry...why me? Cloud was pulled into a timeless dimension of Tifa, Yuffie, and Aerith's feet, where he would be forever subjected to Foot stink, foot sweat, and toe jam. An eternity of foot torture.
Back in reality, once again, both Tifa and Yuffie knew what happened. Aerith was once again so confused. Now that the materia was destroyed, there was no hope of saving Cloud. Tifa and Yuffie managed once again to explain their way out of the situation. As soon as they exited the room however, they burst into laughter. Cloud's predicament was no longer a serious tragedy to them, but something to laugh at. Tifa even banged her booted foot against the ground a couple times, exclaiming, "Hey Cloud, hope you have enough foot sweat to last you forever, HAHAHAHA", Yuffie followed up, "Yeah, hope the smell treats you nice!". What they didn't know, was that if they spoke directly to Cloud, he could hear them. So Cloud would occasionally hear their voices saying things like, "Sniff this" or "Taste my feet Cloud!". In Cloud's dimension, he could never get used to the scent, or the torture at all. it was constant, and eternal.

Note* -- This and the next chapter will be single path only, and the end result will be very much like the above chapter, so if you are not into that, steer clear. :)

"So, were you boys able to find me any nice little chickies today?"

The contemptible Don Corneo looked up at his lackeys, the green-shirted Skotch and dark-skinned Kotch, lust all over his face as he salivated at the thought of yet another night with some lovely ladies. For their part, however, Skotch and Kotch exchanged nervous glances.

"That is, um..." added Kotch.

"We're sorry Don, really!" Kotch exclaimed, "We searched all of Sector 6 and Sector 5 today and couldn't come up with anything."

"Kotch is right, sir." added Skotch, "They were all either too old, too young, or not up to your... standards."

"B-But we did find this." Kotch said, extending a hand to Corneo. In that hand was a yellow piece of materia.

"Materia?!" Corneo bellowed as he eyed it. "Now why would I need something like that? You idiots no I have no use for that junk!"

"B-But sir," Skotch said, "At the very least you might be able to pawn it off on some of the townsfolk for some extra gil. At an inflated price of course."

Don grabbed the materia from Kotch's hand and eyed it once more, "You're right. I could just say it's rare and those sheep will eat it right up." He then lifted his head back to his two underlings, "You two, get out of here! Start the search first thing in the morning. Search every square inch of these dumps that's still standing and don't come back until you find something!" As he watched the two leave, he bellowed, "AND I WANT DOUBLE THE LADIES!"

With that, Corneo returned to looking at the materia. He didn't have any use for it, he thought. He wasn't a fighter, only a lover. Unless this thing could bring him the women that he loved so much, it was useless to him. Of course, Skotch and Kotch were probably right. He had probably been through all of the choice cuts in the area. There were still others he hadn't gotten, however, more higher profile girls.

Girls like Elena of the Turks. She tried to be serious and competent but in the end, Corneo mused, she was just some bimbo in a suit. A suit that managed to make her look like a sexy businesswoman. Oh yes, if she were here the things he would do to her. And that's when he noticed the materia in his hand was glowing.

The small tuft of blond hair on his head changed into a full head of short blond hair, parted to the right side. He grew breasts and... oh no, IT was gone! Staring back at him was that "bimbo" herself. The suit, the hair, that impressive body... it was unmistakable. Somehow he had turned into Elena.

"Oh god, what the hell?!" he asked, "I'm... I'm her. Holy shit! I'm her. Why?!" And then he stopped and an uncharacteristic smile spread on Elena's face. "I'm HER. I've got this broad's body all for myself. I can do anything I want to it." Corneo then raised his hands up and began fondling his new chest. "Goddamn, this girl's got an impressive set on her!" he exclaimed.

After stopping, he looked back at himself. The appearance was all Elena but on the inside, it was all Corneo. He was still curious as to how he had turned into her and if he could turn back. The green palor washed from his skin, until it was pale and flawless as porcelain; similarly, his flame-red hair bleached and grew thick and long, cascading down over the throne, whilst a slim, pointed pair of Hyrulian ears poked their way up out of his new head of hair.

info.brief_description: Final fantasy shenanigans starring the transformative morph materia
info.description:
This story concerns a particular piece of materia from Final Fantasy VII called the morph materia. It is a faintly-glowing yellow sphere a few inches in diameter which, when held, is capable of giving it's wielder special powers.

In the game, morph materia is capable of transforming enemies into items when the final blow is struck. The materia in this interactive is a little more powerful; and is capable of transforming people, creatures or objects into any manner of people, creatures, or objects.

To morph something, the wielder must touch it while simultaneously holding the materia and thinking of the thing they want it to become. Results may vary.

The wielder can also transform themselves, though they have to be touching the materia to change back.

Please add, by all means. I will reward with GPs where deserved.
